Description: Target is able to communicate basic ideas in the language of a specific being (e.g., hungry, thirsty, bathroom, peace, etc.). For the duration of the spell, the target has the equivalent of skill rank 2 in the language.

Creates a 1'R area around the target, into and out of which sound cannot travel; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object/being; +25 to Stalking attempts. See Section 7.1.7.
Creates a plane (up to 20' x 20'), through which sound will not pass.

As Speech I, except target can communicate in more complex concepts, although there is a good chance of misinterpretations. For the duration of the spell, the target has the equivalent of skill rank 4 in the language.
As Quiet I, except radius is 10'.
As Quiet I, except 3 targets can be affected.
As Soundwall I, except 5 such walls are created. Each Soundwall must be connected to at least one other Soundwall.
As Quiet I, except 5 targets may be affected.
As Silence I, except radius is 50'.

As Speech II, except target is reasonably fluent in the language. Target’s accent is imperfect, but there is only a slight chance of misinterpretation. For the duration of the spell, the target has the equivalent of skill rank 6 in the language.
Target can speak at 5 times his normal loudness.
As Silence I, except radius is 100'.
As Soundwall V, except as many Soundwalls as the target’s level can be created.
As Quiet I, except as many targets as the target’s level can be affected.

As Speech III, except for the duration and the target speaks the specified language as if he were a native. For the duration of the spell, the target has the equivalent of skill rank 8 in the language.
